title: Definition of an Even Function
text: A function is called an even function if for every input $$x$$, $$f(x)=f(-x)$$.
speech: A function is called an even function if for every input  x ,  f of x, is equal to, f of negative x .

,   f of x, is equal to, f of negative x

title: Definition of an Odd Function
text: A function is called an odd function if for every input $$x$$, $$f(x)=-f(-x)$$.
speech: A function is called an odd function if for every input  x ,  f of x, is equal to, negative f of negative x .
pacedSpeech: A function is called an odd function if for every input   x
,   f of x, is equal to, negative f of negative x

title: How to Find $$f(-x)$$
text: Find $$f(-x)$$ by subsituting $$-x$$ in wherever $$x$$ appears in the original equation. $${\left(-x\right)}^n=x^n$$ when $$n$$ is an even, and $${\left(-x\right)}^n=-\left(x^n\right)$$ when $$n$$ is odd-- for example, $${\left(x+5\right)}^2$$ $$=$$ $${\left(-\left(-x-5\right)\right)}^2={\left(x+5\right)}^2$$.
speech: Find  f of negative x,  by subsituting  negative x  in wherever  x  appears in the original equation. , parentheses negative x  to the n-th is equal to x to the n-th  when  n  is an even, and , parentheses negative x  to the n-th is equal to negative parentheses x to the n-th   when  n  is odd-- for example, , parentheses x plus 5,  squared   is equal to   parentheses negative parentheses, negative x minus 5,   squared is equal to, parentheses x plus 5,  squared .

title: How to Find $$-f(-x)$$
text: Find $$-f(-x)$$ by multiplying each term of $$f(-x)$$ by $$-1$$.
